Name: Galactic interaction
Description: Galaxies interact in many ways, from the subtle tidal affect's of gravitational attraction causing a deformation of the structure of the galaxies, to cannibalism of one galaxy's stars by another interacting galaxy, to the collision and possible merging of galaxies into a larger single resultant galaxy.

Properties.Name: Duration
Properties.Description: For how long will/did this interaction occur?

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Description: What is the status of this interaction: occurred in the past, ongoing, predicted

Properties.Name: When
Properties.Description: If this is not an ongoing interaction, when did it occur or will it occur in millions of years? Use - values for interactions that occurred previously.
